name: I Came To Forget My Daily Life
name_original: I Came To Forget My Daily Life
description:
An exploration and introspection cyberpunk game about the need to escape our daily reality.

There is some puzzles, platforms, sex, drugs and electronic music on it.

Only inside this game you can play the exclusive game "Life is a Boring VideoGame".

This game is a part of a larger game in development: http://gamejolt.com/games/nude-nights/138659

The game ends when you find this symbol:

CONTROLS
mouse to look
wasd to move
space to jump
shift to run
c to crouch
z to zoom

CREDITS
A game by Opi Fai (https://sites.google.com/site/opifai/)
Coding by Oriol Manyà (http://www.oriolmanya.com/)

SOUNDTRACK by:
Ludique (https://ludique.bandcamp.com/)
Sonde (http://sonde-project.com/)
Oldboy (https://telepaths.bandcamp.com/)
& Opi Fai

Funded by SquatStarter (https://squatstarter.wordpress.com/)
